TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DesignSurface extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class DesignSurface Implements IDisposable, IServiceProvider
public ref class DesignSurface : IDisposable, IServiceProvider

summary.span: 为设计组件提供一个用户界面。

span.span: Presents a user interface for designing components.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现用户视为设计器。The class implements what the user perceives as a designer. 是用户界面用户操作以更改设计时功能。 is the user interface the user manipulates to change design-time features. 提供完全自包含的设计图面。 provides a completely self-contained design surface. 类可能使用作为独立的设计器中，或它可能也会使类以提供通用的应用程序承载多个实现对象。The class may be used as a stand-alone designer, or it may be coupled with the class to provide a common implementation for an application that hosts multiple objects. 类可以由本身，或者用户可以从它派生新类并增加的行为。The class can be used by itself, or the user can derive a new class from it and augment the behavior. 类提供了一些设计时服务自动。The class provides several design-time services automatically. 类添加其所有服务在其构造函数。The class adds all of its services in its constructor. 大多数这些服务可以重写通过替代它们在受保护属性。Most of these services can be overridden by replacing them in the protected property. 若要替换服务，重写构造函数、 调用基类，和通过受保护的任何更改属性。To replace a service, override the constructor, call base, and make any changes through the protected property. 所有服务，它添加到服务容器和实现释放设计图面时，将释放。All services that are added to the service container and that implement are disposed when the design surface is disposed. 可替换的一组默认服务类提供了以下表所示。The default set of replaceable services that the class provides is shown in the following table. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||支持不是容器的组件集合，以提供其自己的扩展程序提供程序的一部分的对象。Enables objects that are not part of the container’s components collection to provide their own extender providers.| ||使用来获取扩展程序提供程序的列表。Used by to get a list of extender providers. 与此服务中，扩展程序提供程序可以实时容器之外。With this service, extender providers can live outside of the container.| ||提供了设计器元数据挂钩。Provides designer metadata hooks. 这是元数据筛选的主接口。This is the primary interface for metadata filtering.| ||使您能够在设计器中选择组件。Provides a way to select components in the designer.| ||使您能够获取对象的名称，即使这些对象位置不正确。Provides a way to get a name for objects, even when those objects are not sited.| ||提供设计图面本身作为服务。Offers the design surface itself as a service.| ||提供用于获取和设置设计器选项值的基类。Provides a base class for getting and setting option values for a designer.| 下表显示非替换默认情况下提供的服务。The following table shows the non-replaceable services provided by default. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||对组件进行更改时引发的事件。Raises events as changes are made to components.| ||控制对类型、 服务和事务的访问。Controls access to types, services, and transactions. 设计器的主接口。Master interface for designers.| ||拥有正在设计的组件组。Owns the set of components that are being designed. 每个设计器有拥有组件。Each designer has an that owns the components.| ||派生自并提供了如何添加和从设计器中删除服务。Derives from and provides a way to add and remove services from the designer.| 除了这些服务，类还提供了可通过组件的站点的单个服务。In addition to these services, the class also provides a single service that is available through a component’s site. 此服务是唯一的每个组件。This service is unique for each component. 下表显示不能被替换的服务。The following table shows the services that cannot be replaced. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||可以用于存储有关组件的任意数据的键/值对一个泛型字典。A generic dictionary of key/value pairs that can be used to store arbitrary data about a component.| ||使组件能够将其他子组件添加到设计器的容器。A container that enables a component to add additional child components to the designer. 这些组件将作为一部分的设计图面上，但将不参与序列化。These components will be part of the design surface, but will not participate in serialization. 当你想要设计能够公开区域本身在设计器中，某个控件时，这非常有用，但你不想要参与序列化的区域。This is useful when you want to design a control that is capable of exposing a region of itself in a designer, but you do not want the region to participate in serialization.| 除了，此站点还实现以下接口。In addition to , the site also implements the following interfaces. > [!CAUTION] > 检查存在这些接口，而不是使用不加选择地强制转换，因为其他站点实现可能不能实现它们。Check for the existence of these interfaces, rather than use indiscriminate casting, because other site implementations may not implement them. |服务Service|描述Description| |-------------|-----------------| ||提供一种方法可用于访问特定于站点的服务的容器。Provides a way to get to the container of site-specific services. 例如，是特定于站点的服务。For example, is a site-specific service. 通过此服务，你可以添加其他特定于站点的服务。With this service, you can add additional site-specific services.|

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用构造函数，它会创建简单的设计器加载程序，反过来，创建给定类型的一个组件，并随后结束加载过程。When you use the constructor, it creates a simple designer loader that, in turn, creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 这是一种简单方法创建设计器中的，假定所有将外部完成保存状态。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 在内部，这将调用并将传递根组件类型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type. > [!NOTE] > 重载不会影响。The overload is not affected by . 设计图面加载之前必须是服务容器中。The must be in the service container before the design surface loads. 如果你需要访问、 调用空构造函数、 添加到并调用与`rootComponentType`。If you need access to , call the empty constructor, add the to the and call with `rootComponentType`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建简单的设计器加载程序创建给定类型的一个组件，随后结束加载过程。Using the constructor creates a simple designer loader that creates a component of the given type and then ends the loading process. 这是一种简单方法创建设计器中的，假定所有将外部完成保存状态。This is a straightforward way to create a designer, under the assumption that all saving of state will be done externally. 在内部，这将调用并将传递根组件类型。Internally, this calls and passes the root component type.

summary.span: 使用给定的设计器加载程序开始加载过程。

span.span: Begins the loading process with the given designer loader.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因此加载可能继续进行此调用已返回后，可以是异步的设计器加载。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 附加到事件处理程序设计图面完成加载时要通知的事件。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 后是调用，还可以立即获得视图设计器中，因为设计器加载程序必须提供至少的根组件在异步加载时。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously.

exception.span: 为 。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void BeginLoad(class System.Type rootComponentType) cil managed

param.name: rootComponentType
param.span: 要在设计模式中创建的组件的类型。

span.span: The type of component to create in design mode.

summary.span: 开始加载过程。

span.span: Begins the loading process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`rootComponentType`指定，则默认设计器加载程序，只需创建的实例`rootComponentType`将使用。When `rootComponentType` is specified, a default designer loader that simply creates an instance of `rootComponentType` will be used. 因此加载可能继续进行此调用已返回后，可以是异步的设计器加载。Designer loading can be asynchronous, so the loading may continue to progress after this call has returned. 附加到事件处理程序设计图面完成加载时要通知的事件。Attach an event handler to the event to be notified when the design surface has completed loading. 后是调用，还可以立即获得视图设计器中，因为设计器加载程序必须提供至少的根组件在异步加载时。After is called, you can immediately obtain the view for the designer, because designer loaders must provide at least the root component when loading asynchronously. > [!NOTE] > 方法创建的组件类型的实例并初始化此实例的设计器。The method creates an instance of the component type and initializes a designer for this instance. 此方法返回之前，将引发事件。The event is raised before this method returns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性将保存当前处于设计模式下的所有对象。The property holds all objects that are currently in design mode. 当将组件添加到，其设计器中，如果任何，则会加载。When components are added to , their designer, if any, is loaded. 提供到设计图面上的完全访问权限的站点组件所在。The component is sited with a site that provides full access to the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner CreateDesigner (System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, bool rootDesigner);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesigner CreateDesigner(class System.ComponentModel.IComponent component, bool rootDesigner) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Function CreateDesigner (component As IComponent, rootDesigner As Boolean) As IDesigner
protected public: virtual System::ComponentModel::Design::IDesigner ^ CreateDesigner(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, bool rootDesigner);

param.name: component
param.span: 应为其创建设计器的组件。

span.span: The component for which the designer should be created.

param.name: rootDesigner
param.span: 表示创建根设计器； 表示创建普通设计器。

span.span: to create a root designer; to create a normal designer.

summary.span: 在将组件添加到容器时创建设计器。

span.span: Creates a designer when a component is added to the container.

returns.span: 所请求的设计器的实例，如果找不到匹配的设计器，则为 。

span.span: An instance of the requested designer, or if no matching designer could be found.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用在设计图面时组件添加到容器。The method is called by the design surface’s when a component is added to the container. 此方法创建设计器中，但不对其进行初始化。This method creates a designer, but does not initialize it. 当它返回时，由容器初始化设计器。When it returns, the designer is initialized by the container. 可以创建两个不同类型的设计器： 根设计器和普通设计器。 can create two different types of designers: root designers and normal designers. 根设计器是用于在设计图面，即通过定义第一个组件添加到容器中的根组件的设计器。A root designer is a designer for the root component in the design surface, which by definition is the first component added to the container. 根设计器不同于普通设计器，因为他们负责向最终用户显示的用户界面。Root designers differ from normal designers because they are responsible for the user interface presented to the end user. 根设计器通常协调与设计图面上的设计器，以提供此接口的其余部分。Root designers typically coordinate with the rest of the designers on a design surface to provide this interface. 此方法的默认实现委托给，并传入作为根设计器的设计器类型或作为普通设计器。The default implementation of this method delegates to , passing in as the designer type for root designers, or for normal designers. 你可以重写此方法来请求特定类型的设计器。You can override this method to request a specific type of designer.

summary.span: 创建一个适合嵌套控件或组件的容器。

span.span: Creates a container suitable for nesting controls or components.
The nested container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将组件添加到嵌套容器创建其设计器，并使其适合所有服务可从设计图面。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 添加到嵌套容器的组件不参与序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization.

summary.span: 创建一个适合嵌套控件或组件的容器。

span.span: Creates a container suitable for nesting controls or components.
The nested container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将组件添加到嵌套容器创建其设计器，并使其适合所有服务可从设计图面。Adding a component to a nested container creates its designer and makes it eligible for all services available from the design surface. 添加到嵌套容器的组件不参与序列化。Components added to nested containers do not participate in serialization. 你可以提供其他名称方法，从而将值转换为`containerName`。You can provide an additional name for the method by passing a value into `containerName`.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共方法遵循标准模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法将销毁设计图面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 此方法的受保护的版本是`virtual`，它遵循普通模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因为不具有任何本机代码，以清理时，它不具有终结器调用。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果你需要调用，你必须自己添加一个终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 公共方法遵循标准模式。The public method follows the standard pattern. 调用此方法将销毁设计图面。Calling this method destroys the design surface. 此方法的受保护的版本是`virtual`，它遵循普通模式。The protected version of this method is `virtual` and follows the normal pattern. > [!NOTE] > 因为不具有任何本机代码，以清理时，它不具有终结器调用。Because does not have any native code to clean up, it does not have a finalizer that calls . 如果你需要调用，你必须自己添加一个终结器。If you need to call , you must add a finalizer yourself. 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

summary.span: 在释放设计图面时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the design surface is disposed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 图面是仅释放的在公共方法调用。The surface is only disposed when the public method on is called.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool DtelLoading { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

value.span: 如果**设计时错误列表**加载; 否则为。

span.span: if the **Design-time Error List** is loading; otherwise, .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Flush() cil managed

summary.span: 序列化对设计图面的更改。

span.span: Serializes changes to the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可以调用以进行推送到设计图面下序列化程序所做的更改。The method can be called to push changes made to the design surface down to the serializer. 这可确保设计图面和其序列化的状态同步。This ensures that the design surface and its serialized state are synchronized. 此方法的实际实现转发到与设计图面关联的设计器加载程序。The actual implementation of this method is forwarded to the designer loader associated with design surface. 设计器加载程序可以选择更改推迟到调用时，它也可能选择序列化的数据保留最新的用户的所有更改。The designer loader may choose to defer changes until is called, or it may choose to keep the serialized data up to date with all user changes. 方法可确保，无论设计器加载程序选择使用的模式，如何序列化的状态同步与实际的设计图面。The method ensures that regardless of the model the designer loader chooses to use, the serialized state is synchronized with the actual design surface.

summary.span: 调用 的 方法时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a call is made to the method of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 首先，刷新设计器加载程序，然后引发事件。The designer loader is flushed first, and then the event is raised.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetService(class System.Type serviceType) cil managed
Public Function GetService (serviceType As Type) As Object

span.span: The type of service to retrieve.

summary.span: 从服务容器中获取服务。

span.span: Gets a service from the service container.

returns.span: 实现 或作为其派生类的对象，如果服务容器中不存在该服务，则为 。

span.span: An object that implements, or is a derived class of, , or if the service does not exist in the service container.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索设计图面服务容器中的服务。The method retrieves a service in the design surface’s service container. 此外，这将转发到任何服务提供程序在构造时提供给设计图面。In addition, this will forward to any service provider that was given to the design surface at construction time.

public: property bool IsLoaded { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示当前是否正在加载设计图面。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the design surface is currently loaded.

value.span: 如果当前正在加载设计图面，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the design surface is currently loaded; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在设计器加载完成时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the designer load has completed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 成功加载，以及不成功的均将引发事件。The event is raised for successful loads as well as unsuccessful ones. 如果此事件处理程序中的代码引发异常，则设计器将被卸载。If code in this event handler throws an exception, the designer is unloaded. 对象可以用于确定加载是否成功，并且它还可以为在加载期间发生的错误的列表。The object can be used to determine if loading succeeded, and it can also provide a list of errors that occurred during the load. > [!NOTE] > 成功加载，前提是序列化系统可以承受错误可能发生错误。Errors can occur for successful loads as well, provided that the serialization system can tolerate errors.

MemberSignature.Value: Protected ReadOnly Property ServiceContainer As ServiceContainer

summary.span: 获取服务容器。

span.span: Gets the service container.

value.span: 为设计图面中包含的设计器提供所有服务的服务容器。

span.span: The service container that provides all services to designers contained within the design surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在构造时将默认服务添加到此服务容器。At construction time, adds default services into this service container. 您可以将默认服务留在其当前状态，也可以删除它们并将其替换为你自己。You can leave the default services in their present state, or you can remove them and replace them with your own. 默认服务是所有按需创建，因此将它们添加在构造时的性能不会丢失。The default services are all demand-created, so there is no loss in performance for adding them at construction time.

exception.span: 附加到 的 已被释放。

span.span: The attached to the has been disposed.

summary.span: 在设计器完成卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a designer has finished unloading.

summary.span: 在设计器将要卸载时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a designer is about to unload.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当卸载设计器时，被销毁该设计器的整个状态，包括设计器的视图。When a designer unloads, the entire state for that designer is destroyed, including the designer’s view. 此时，该视图应是没有父级。The view should be unparented at this time.

span.span: The design surface is not loading, the designer loader has not yet created a root designer, or the design surface finished the load, but failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要支持方法，事件处理程序应激活此设计图面的窗口。If you want to support the method, your event handler should activate the window for this design surface.
